response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This product holds immense value to us, but its true worth to you surpasses $800,000. We are offering it to you at a special price of $750,000, a significant discount from its original valuation. This is a unique chance to secure a high-quality asset at a favorable rate. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
